attributes.action: Rename the Independent Police Complaints Commission (IPCC)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The title of this committee implies that there is a pre-disposed acceptence of guilt or at least contributory negligence; this should not be the case, they should be impartial. We have seen how PCC initiates investigation rather than just responds to complaints made.Ensure that it only investigates complaints properly made and call it eg Independent Police Investigation Commission.
